lead_paragraph: Residents of Rio de Janeiro will get three new holidays during the Olympics as part of a plan to keep people off the roads and limit the city's suffocating traffic.

headline.print_headline: Rio Gets 3 Holidays During Olympics, Traffic Fines Loom
headline.main: Rio Gets 3 Holidays During Olympics, Traffic Fines Loom

snippet: Residents of Rio de Janeiro will get three new holidays during the Olympics as part of a plan to keep people off the roads and limit the city's suffocating traffic....
